page.title: 02The Scaynes Hill Church
page.content: The present vicar is{Rev. B.J. {Gardiner}who first became vicar in 1966. There have been five vicars altogther whose names are listed below:{Rev. C.A.Greenland(1930-1938), {Rev. M.J.Tanner(1938-1940), Rev. {H.S.Box(1940-1955), Rev. {R.E.Scott(1956-1966),& Rev. {B.J.Gardiner(1966-?).}It has a small church with about 25 pews in total. It has an organ and a piano. It has two main hymn books,{100 Hymns Today}and Ancient and Modern Hymns. It also has The Order for Holy Communion &{The {Common Prayer.}There are several plaques in the church. One is for Henry Rydon who died on{14th Jan. 1885 {and his wife who}died on{10th May 1896 {In memory of Father Jasper Foulkes {Lynch}who died at sea on{31st Jan. {1931}In memory of Rev. W.H.Stallard {(1856-1860). }
